page.name: Presentation: A Model for Collaboration [Video]
page.intro: The outcome of a lesson is the student performance and learning, right? So doesn't it make sense to evaluate our lessons based on student work? Watch this presentation to learn how to do this in a deliberate way.
page.content:
The outcome of a lesson is the student performance and learning, right? So doesn't it make sense to evaluate our lessons based on student work? Watch the presentation below to learn how to do this in a deliberate way, collaborating with peers.

 

 

 

 

[Transcript of presentation]

Use the LASW Protocol with your team to be efficient.

Find a review of research on the effectiveness of this model of teacher collaboration as professional learning - if you are interested.

Find more in-depth information about professional learning communities at this online resource, linked - if you are interested. You may be asked to register for this free site.

[The video content presented here requires JavaScript to be enabled and the latest version of the Adobe Flash Player. If you do not have the latest version, please update Adobe Flash Player.]
